column5: he Master's degree in Data Science prepares students to be expert in data analysis, gaining interdisciplinary skills across a number of disciplines and technologies. These highly-demanded skills are key to analyse the large amounts of data that today’s society and businesses operate upon.The offered curricula cover a broad range of theories and tools: from engineering, computer science, mathematics, statistics, machine learning, artificial intelligence and big data. Through this programme, students will learn to collect, organise and process big data amounts, obtaining highly valuable information for businesses and industry processes.
